channel.title: Yell/Message Title
channel.description: I was wounder how i can change yell/message titles for me and other people in my server which is a 317, can someone tell how 2?

item.title: Yell/Message Title
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

np, happy to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell/Message Title
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:3, topic:380111”]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;
if (donator == 1) {
titles = "[Donator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Administrator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[Owner] ";
}
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = “[Hidden Admin]”;
}
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = "[Player] ";
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}
figure the rest out, quite simple[/quote]

Hey thanks man it worked XD

Read full topic

item.title: Yell/Message Title
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:380111”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=475954.msg3481260#msg3481260 date=1296157362]
I made that code up fast before school, so I would have used code tags if it wasn’t 5 mins before I had to go to my bus stop.

If he doesn’t want hidden admin he can change it on there he can remove it, I put that on there to show what all the ranks are, not for a hidden admin to use ::yell and say hey I’m a player, and then show hidden admin rank. L2 use common sense.
[/quote]

You were rushing for your bus, yet you took the time to type up another rank?

/retard[/quote]
It took 10 seconds to type it. And in the source I use those are all the ranks.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell/Message Title
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles[] = {
“[Player]”,"[Moderator]","[Administrator]","[Owner]","[Player]"/"[Hidden Admin]"/};
yell(titles[playerRights] + “” + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

and The Soul i did see yours… but you gotta think about it o.o
Your way “[Mod]” would appear if their rights is 0…

and if their rights isn’t in the list it would crash.

good attempt tho (:

Read full topic

item.title: Yell/Message Title
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[code] String[] titles = {
“[Mod]”, “[Admin]”, “[Owner]”
}
…

 if(command.startsWith("yell")) {
     yell(titles[playerRights]+" "+playerName+": "+command.substring(5));
 }[/code]

Read full topic
